picks.notes: Heisman winner, led Indiana to national title. Elite accuracy and decision-making.
Top-5 prospect, All-American. Versatile LB/edge with elite athleticism.
Top OT in class, Consensus All-American. Elite pass protection and run blocking.
Elite pass rusher, dominant at Miami. Prototype edge with power and quickness.
Elite safety, All-American. Range, instincts, and ball skills.
Versatile offensive lineman. Strong pass protection and run blocking.
Elite pass rusher, most productive in nation. Explosive first step, relentless motor.
Dynamic receiver with size and athleticism. Strong route runner and contested catch ability.
Elite three-down back. Vision, power, and receiving ability.
Freakishly athletic linebacker. Elite tackling, sideline-to-sideline speed, strong coverage.
Consensus top cornerback. Ball skills, coverage versatility, First-Team All-SEC.
Versatile corner with instincts and tackling. Can play nickel, outside, or safety.
Biletnikoff winner. Elite route runner, slot weapon, reliable hands.
Dominant interior lineman. Violent run blocker, reliable pass protector, First-Team All-Big Ten.
SEC Defensive Player of the Year. Elite speed rusher, 11.5 sacks, unanimous All-American.
Contested-catch standout. Three-level receiver, continues OSU WR first-round tradition.
Five-star interior disruptor. Quick first step, versatile across DL positions.
Rising star safety. Elite length, instincts, zone coverage. Senior Bowl invitee.
Best LB in class. Run defense, instincts, All-American. Roquan Smith comparison.
Unanimous All-American DT. Nation's best rush defender, anchors elite defense.
Breakout pocket passer. 28 TDs, 5 INTs, led Bama to SEC title. NFL-ready mechanics.
Lengthy edge with run defense. Strong bull rush, projects first round.
Smooth, rangy tackle. Versatile RT/LT, strong run game. Four-star pedigree.
Paul Hornung Award winner. Dynamic YAC, versatile slot/outside, return threat.
Elite edge rusher. Explosive first step, 6 sacks, 41 pressures in 2025.
Elite hands, contested-catch standout. 76.9% contested catch rate, 11 TDs in 2025.
Elite run blocker, zero sacks allowed. Top guard prospect, First-Team All-Big Ten.
Potential No. 1 pick tackle. Five-star, Freshman All-American, Lombardi finalist.
Lockdown corner, A.J. Terrell's brother. 12 PBUs, 2 INTs in 2024.
Top-3 TE in class. 46 catches, 8 TDs. Willing blocker, red zone threat.
ESPN's No. 1 pure tackle. Zero sacks allowed, First-Team All-Big 12.
True nose tackle. Run-stuffer with power. First-team All-Big 12.
